title: RECOLLECTION
lyrics:
Something change tto dasi neol boni dalla oh
Yejeon-en mollassdeon moseub-e tteollyeo oh why
Chueogsog-e dul
Taeyeonhaessdeon ibyeol
Eolisughan geu jangmyeon



Kkoch-i mangaehan geunal neol tteona bonaessneunde

Ttatteushan haes-sal balamgwa hamkke

Bom-i chaj-aon geunal neoleul miwohaessneunde

Ije waseo geuliun geu nal



Ah nun-i busideon

Ah geu sigan-eul gieoghae

Ah ij-eossda saeng-gaghaessneunde



Kkoch-i mangaehan geunal dol-agago sip-eojyeo

Ttatteushan haes-sal balamgwa hamkke



Sigan heulleo dol-ikyeoboni joh-eun gieogtuseong-in meolis-sog

Gieoghagi silh-eo daleun saeng-gag hamyeon mwohae geulae mwohae

Eochapi gyesog neol tteoolligo issneun baboingeol



Neoui frame an-e gadeug chan geulim-en

Nan salajyeobeolyeossji



Kkoch-i mangaehan geunal neol tteona bonaessneunde

Ttatteushan haes-sal balamgwa hamkke

Bom-i chaj-aon geunal neoleul miwohaessneunde

Ije waseo geuliun geu nal



Ah eolin ma-eum-e

Ah igijeog-in saeng-gag-e

Ah dulyeoum-e domangchyeoss-eo



Kkoch-i mangaehan geunal dol-agago sip-eojyeo

Ttatteushan haes-sal balamgwa hamkke



Meonji deop-in chueog-i ssisgyeonaelyeo oh

Seonmyeonghage tteoolla uli du salam ttaseuhan bomnalcheoleom



Kkoch-i mangaehan geunal neol tteona bonaessneunde

Ttatteushan haes-sal balamgwa hamkke

Bom-i chaj-aon geunal neoleul miwohaessneunde

Ije waseo geuliun geu nal



Ah nun-i busideon

Ah geu sigan-eul gieoghae

Ah ij-eossda saeng-gaghaessneunde



Kkoch-i mangaehan geunal bom-i chaj-aon geunal

Ttatteushan haes-sal balamgwa hamkke
